the following line in your ', ':', 'Consult ', ' to see which flags can be used.', 'This viewer was made with neovim compatibility in mind. With the use of ', ',
this script is able to open files in the current neovim window (or spawn a new neovim
window if there is no window available).', 'However, to make it fully compatible with neovim and to make neovim able to sync
its current file to the viewer, ', '
should be installed and the following line should be added to your ', ':', 'This setting will sync the file to the viewer after every save.', 'Alternatively, if syncing after every save is not enough, smdv can also be used
